transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hanji.
Customer: Ji sir, GS fan hai sir?
Executive: Hanji sir, GS fan hai sir jisse lagaya usse baat karna. 
Customer: Ha sir bataiye bataiye kya. 
Customer: Ramashankar baat kar raha hu yaar aap please dekhiyega ek bar.
Customer: Ha main dekh lunga sir isko ek bar sham tak agar. 
Customer: Ha ha dekh ke batao please.
Executive: Ji ji batata hu main aapko. 
Customer: Kya issue matlab main kya inquiry hai us wale pe aa rahi hai. 
Customer: Inquiry nahi aa rahi hai itna call yaar.
Executive: Inquiry to sir dekho do do aapke yaha dikh rahi hai mere ko saat din ke andar do teen inquiry aayi hai.
Customer: Dekho mere bhai dekho.
Executive: Nahi main usi ka bata raha hu dekh ke bata raha hu sir do inquiry aayi hai uska kya inquiry kis related aayi thi aapko.
Customer: Main dekh leta hu sir main bahar abhi na office se bahar aa gaya tha main. 
Customer: Ha.
Customer: Main ruki kar lo aap mere ko call.
Customer: Sand blasting waha par hai aapke pass sand blasting waha par hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi nahi wo sand blasting main karta hi new dealing bhiya.
Customer: Achcha achcha.
Customer: Sand blasting related koi bhi cheez aati hai na to main nahi banata nahi hu.
Customer: Theek theek theek theek.
Customer: Short blast short blast. 
Customer: Ha. 
Customer: Theek hai. 
Customer: Okay sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving enough buyleads.

- Enquires related to sand blasting.



Resolution:

- Executive informed about two-three inquiries in seven days.

- Customer informed he doesn't deal with sand blasting.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, inquiry, sand blasting
